data.name: Schoolgirl Strikers: Arrived! The Lone Knight
data.short_description: Odile finally makes her move, and announces that she's going to steal Fifth Force's Stella Prism. The team manages to figure out her true identity, but Odile is way too strong to handle, either way. Will they be able to talk things out with her?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
